cards.detail: {{#patient}}You recently had high blood pressure readings (>140 systolic or > 90 diastolic) which suggests hypertension, but no diagnosis is in your chart.{{/patient}}{{#careTeam}}Patient had multiple blood pressure readings of SBP > 140mm Hg and/or DBP > 90. This suggests the patient may have Stage 2 Hypertension, but no diagnosis was found.{{/careTeam}}|https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYP.0000000000000065|[ { "label": "Contact care team diagnosis", "actions": ["{{#patient}} Contact your care team about high blood presure diagnosis {{/patient}}"] } ]|at-most-one|
